comment.body:
Decentralized networks, I believe we have many of them already. What about any working decentralized reputation system?

Personally I am waiting for new decentralized reputation systems to emerge. Because I think that decentralized reputation + self-budgeting and self-governance system (like DASH's [DGBB](http://dashwhale.org/budget), see http://dashvotetracker.com/) = new powerful economy.
